1370: Everyng was born in Lievevrouwe kerch in 1370.
Got married to Vreile at age 25 in 1370.
Had a daughter with Vreile, Ermerut, at age 25.
1371: Had a son with Vreile, Tiuri, at age 26.
1372: Had a son with Vreile, Valken, at age 27.
1374: Had a daughter with Vreile, Meynseth, at age 29.
1378: Had a daughter with Vreile, Trame, at age 33.
1379: Had a son with Vreile, Rissewint, at age 34.
1381: Lost his wife Vreile while she was giving birth to Godino in 1381.
Lost son Godino when Godino was 1 years old.
1382: Lost daughter Trame when Trame was 5 years old.
